argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | submss.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ssid | |- B C_ B |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( M e. Mnd -> B C_ B ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` M ) = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_mndidcl | |- ( M e. Mnd -> ( 0g ` M ) e. B ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_ressid | |- ( M e. Mnd -> ( M |`s B ) = M ) |
| 7 |  | #P_id | |- ( M e. Mnd -> M e. Mnd ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( M e. Mnd -> ( M |`s B ) e. Mnd ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( M |`s B ) = ( M |`s B ) |
| 10 | 1, 4, 9 | #P_issubm2 | |- ( M e. Mnd -> ( B e. ( SubMnd ` M ) <-> ( B C_ B /\ ( 0g ` M ) e. B /\ ( M |`s B ) e. Mnd ) ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 5, 8, 10 | #P_mpbir3and | |- ( M e. Mnd -> B e. ( SubMnd ` M ) ) |
